creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: curved wires terminating in small spirals; organic design with tiny twisted wire trim and looped wire edging at bottom; 3 balls near bottom of pendant; 5 small floral pendants hang from each earring, each with 2 organic wire drops
dimension:
3 1/4 x 1 1/2 x 5/16 in. (8.26 x 3.81 x 0.79 cm) (a) including drops)
3 3/8 x 1 1/2 x 5/16 in. (8.57 x 3.81 x 0.79 cm) (b) including drops)
title: Pair of earrings
